task: Develop a basic Gomoku game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Get a neck massage'.
name: Zenmoku

branding_data.short_description: A mindful twist on Gomoku where strategy meets relaxation.
branding_data.detailed_description: Zenmoku is a unique take on the classic Gomoku, blending strategic gameplay with moments of mindfulness. Every five moves, players are prompted to take a brief relaxation pause, encouraging a calm and focused approach to victory. With soothing visuals and a tranquil ambiance, Zenmoku transforms a competitive board game into a meditative experience.
